title: Protein Pancakes â€“ Only 4 Ingredients!
directions: Place a non-stick skillet on the stove over medium heat. Spray with cooking spray or use butter or coconut oil and let melt.
Mix the eggs, protein powder, and baking powder and water in a large bowl.
Using a 1/3 cup measure, pour out the batter into the skillet. I was able to make 3 at a time. They are ready to flip when bubble start to form on the top.
Serve with butter, sugar free syrup, and chocolate chips.
ingredients: 2 scoops Whey Protein powder (I used Vanilla Premiere Protein)
Cooking spray, butter, or coconut oil for greasing the pan
